tool_description: The one stop shop for currency exchange data
name: Currencytick
title: Currencytick

api_list.name: Historical Exchange Rate
api_list.description: Get the exchange rate on a specific date

api_list.name: Live currency exchange rate
api_list.description: Get the exchange rate between two currencies.

required_parameters.name: target
required_parameters.description: A three-letter identifier assigned by ISO e.g. USD, GBP

required_parameters.name: base
required_parameters.description: A three-letter identifier assigned by ISO e.g. USD, GBP

api_list.name: List of supported currencies
api_list.description: Get the list of supported currencies, currently 220 currencies are supported.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currencytick.p.rapidapi.com/supported_currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currencytick.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://currencytick.p.rapidapi.com/supported_currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currencytick.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
